DOC.brief_summary: In patient sepsis AKI , increase intensity renal replacement therapy 50 mL/kg/h ( HVHF ) 85 mL/kg/h ( EHVHF ) increase survival 28 day 90 day .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Intensity Continuous Renal Replacement Therapy
DOC.criteria: meet least one follow criterion : oliguria ( urine output le 100 mL 6 h period unresponsive fluid resuscitation ) , serum potassium concentration 6.5 mmol/L , severe acidemia ( pH < 7.2 ) , serum creatinine 250 µmol/L , presence severe organ edema ( e.g . pulmonary edema ) . presence malignant tumor , chronic renal insufficiency ( serum creatinine > 133 µmol/L ) , receive kind renal replacement therapy randomization .
